alert.note: Alert for Missaukee (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 24 at 3:27PM EDT until July 24 at 3:45PM EDT by NWS Gaylord
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 PM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN MISSAUKEE COUNTY... At 327 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Moddersville, or 14 miles southwest of Houghton Lake, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Missaukee County. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
